alert.note: Alert for Meade (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 27 at 5:21PM MDT until May 27 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM MDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN BUTTE...SOUTHWESTERN MEADE AND SOUTHEASTERN LAWRENCE COUNTIES... At 521 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 10 miles southeast of Owl Butte to 14 miles northwest of Hereford to near Tilford, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Summerset, Piedmont, Tilford and Dalton Lake. This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 36 and 48. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
